info.title: Central Beauty
info.description:
????? API is the backend supporting the android app of the same name. It provides a central storage and public access to the data.

You can download he android app at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.dyndns.warenix.centralBeauty

I personally don't own the data. Please credit "Apple Daily HK" for it.
